title:
Stability of solutions of semilinear evolution equations with
  integro-differential operators
abstract:
We consider solutions of the Cauchy problem for semilinear equations with
(possibly) different L\'evy operators. We provide various results on their
convergence under the assumption that symbols of the involved operators
converge to the symbol of some L\'evy operator. Some results are proved for a
more general class of pseudodifferential operators.
